name: emi.dpm
description:
Storage Element with SRM interface using MySQL as database backend.

and

Disk server for a Disk Pool Manager (DPM) Storage Element (SE).
releaseNotes:
What's new:

    Allow definition of number of threads for DPM and SRM at startup Improved drain performance

    Syslog support

    Filesystem selection based on weights



Installation and Configuration:

    No special instructions



Known issues:

    None
